briefdescription.para: L3 GRE Tunnel Encapsulation | L2 Ethernet header | IP header | GRE header | Original mirrored packet.
SAI type of encapsulation for RSPAN and ERSPAN.

detaileddescription.para: Mirroring traffic is independent from original traffic, original traffic not affected by congestion of mirroring traffic
Mirroring traffic is correlated with original traffic, and can cause back pressure and discards of original traffic if there is congestion

briefdescription.para: Truncate size. Truncate mirrored packets to this size to reduce SPAN traffic bandwidth.
Mirror sample rate. Every 1/sample_rate the packets will be mirrored.

detaileddescription.para: Value 0 to no sampling Value 1 to every packet sampling (normal mirror)

briefdescription.para: Controls whether mirroring traffic can cause back pressure and packet drop of the original traffic.

detaileddescription.para: Valid for RSPAN or ERSPAN with valid Vlan header.
Valid for RSPAN or ERSPAN with valid Vlan header.
Valid for RSPAN or ERSPAN with valid Vlan header.
Valid for RSPAN or ERSPAN with valid Vlan header.

briefdescription.para: Valid for ERSPAN, GRE protocol Id.
UDP source port. UDP source port to encapsulate SFLOW packets.
UDP destination port. UDP destination port to encapsulate SFLOW packets.
SAI type of encapsulation for RSPAN and ERSPAN.
